local_intent: Ensure the block is perceived if needed, then actively align to it (0.005 tol), set yaw to 90, perform main and corrective pushes toward the T-outline, and verify goal attainment.
assumptions: Raster scan may be required if not initially visible
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: visibility check with retry scan, detect, align (attrs match local annotation), set yaw 90, push 0.2 then 0.1 along 90 deg, then verify with IsAt goal.
